Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ctry2459-H2 analog (synthetic AMPs, Phe-rich; Leu-rich; UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, scorpion, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (77.78%) toCtry2459 WTL=F: 33%; H: 22%.Activity: inhibit hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection (EC50 1.08 ug/ml).Toxicity: Huh7.5.1 cells (LC50 >500 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Hong W, Zhang R, Di Z, He Y, Zhao Z, Hu J, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.2013
Literature Information.Title: Design of histidine-rich peptides with enhanced bioavailability and inhibitory activity against hepatitis C virus.
